title: "Art is an object plus a story. Even for Hunter Biden’s pricey paintings."
excerpt: "Hunter Biden plans to enter the New York art world with a show at Georges Bergès Gallery in SoHo. A Boston man may have captured the essence of public reaction to the news a week ago, when he strolled into the gallery with a can of pink spray paint and began writing the word “Daddy” on the wall."
